title: LF Serious Team Members Plat+ (Must be in Melbourne)
body:
Hey Guys, My name is XSirCution and I would like to create a serious team.

We are currently looking for team members that are serious and would like to participate in competitive gameplay.
We are looking for both starters and subs so if anyone is interested leave a comment below
or add Rakragap/XSirCution/Yuki Dark(Our Manager)

Thank you for your time

-XSirCution

Current Team
Top: 
Jungle:
Mid: Rakragap
ADC: XSirCution
Support:

Current Rank:
Lane:
Age:
Form of Communication: (skype prefferably)
Availability:
Why you want to join the team:

Note: It is not a must to be in Melbourne, Its just a preference. Thank you.

Why you want to join the team: I'm based in Melbourne and am looking for a bunch of guys to play r5 or other tournies with :)

Why you want to join the team: Im just looking to join a competitive team aswell as improve my own gameplay, Please consider me, im just looking to improve and play competitive gameplay
